name: Jason Kohn
text: Amazing CBD products. Very knowledgeable Staff, and great buying experience. They make you feel welcome to the store. And answer any questions you may have,and help you decide what best fits your lifestyle. Overall highly recommend this Local store.

resp.text: Thanks, Jason. Great to get to know you

name: Travis M
text: Hands down one of the better dispensary experiences I've had since living here. The staff completely understands and levels with the customers and makes the whole process way more personal than other places. Thanks so much for hemp-helpfully helping me get  relief I need!

resp.text: Thanks!

name: zach rowland
text: Great guys here!!! They really are well Informed on all stuff CBD!!!!

name: Macy Walden
text: Aaron was amazing. He knew what he was talking about when showing me different strands of hemp and he even gave me samples to try that just came in and are strong. Great guy.

resp.text: Thanks!!

name: Kevin Ives
text: Awesome experience.  The customer service and expert knowledge of their products helped me choose what I was looking for.  I highly recommend this business to others and I will be returning for future purchases.

resp.text: Wow! Thanks, Kevin

name: Chandler Breal
text: Great experience, very nice people that work there. And some seriously amazing products!

resp.text: Thx!

name: Laura Delmarsh
text:
The impeccable customer service paired with expert knowledge provided an excellent experience when searching for the proper product.
I highly recommend Simply CBD for not only their extensive inventory of product, but for attentive service focused on you and your individual needs.

name: Adam Hamilton
text: My wife and I had an excellent experience at Simply CBD today.  Chad and Aaron were very helpful and knowledgeable.  They were able to recommend a tincture and chews for our dog who has seizures and tremors, as well as, a tincture for the bursitis in my shoulder.  The quality control practiced in production of the products is impeccable.  You can even see the individual lab results for each product.

resp.text: Thanks, Adam. So nice to meet you both.

name: Lilith Knight
text: There's a pretty good variety but probably the best quality I've seen in Southern Alabama.

name: Josh Holliday
text: I have been shopping at Simply CBD in Daphne for a couple of months now. The quality of the product line is incredible. High quality CBD products! The staff is highly knowledgeable about the science and applications of each of their products. I highly recommend Simply CBD!

resp.text: Thanks, Josh!

name: Jakob Johnson
text: Great selection, great service, and great prices! Aaron is very knowledgeable on CBD products and is committed to helping you make an informed purchase. I highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Thanks for high praise, Jakob. We appreciate you.

name: Aaron VanHauter
text: So I stopped in because I keep hearing about Delta-8. I was in another store down the road and they just kept trying to push it and couldn't give me info about it, so I left went down the road and Simply spent 20 min going over what the Delta-8 is, what I should expect and how to take it. If knowing what you put in your body is important then go check them out

name: Molly Armstrong
text: Great staff and amazing prices!!

resp.text: Thanks, Molly. Hope everything works well for you!

name: Kendall Pledger
text: Best CBD store I've been to. Always greeted with a smiling (now masked) face💗 Me and my husband couldn't think of any better way to spend our money than on these products. True relief and relaxation to the deepest pain 💙

name: Melody Duncan
text: Aaron is super kind and knowledgeable about the products offered in store—-also, there is an array of natural skin care products available, not just CBD products!

resp.text: Thanks, Melody. Always great to see you. Good energy!

name: Shermeka Brandon
text: A great store to go too I love it I will be going back

name: Karen Barkle
text: The people are so very knowledgeable. They have answered every question I have come up with. They give great advice for what ails us and are very friendly. Great service, great products!

name: Milissa Guitterrez
text: Aaron and Chad are extremely knowledgeable. As I have engaged in conversations with several CBD business owners, it is clear that they stand head and shoulders above! They are careful to ask multiple questions in an effort to truly solve the problem at hand. In asking questions and receiving answers to those questions, it’s evident that they have researched and provided some of the best products out there. They do a great job in educating!

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) We appreciate that, Milissa

(Original)
We appreciate that, Milissa

name: Robin Ponder
text: Awesome store. These guys know their products, are friendly and helpful and offer great suggestions but are not pushy. They are the real deal. Dont mess around with those other stores

name: Steve Avery
text: Okay, so there a few places in the area I visited in Fairhope and Daphne. Simply CBD is on a whole nother level. Aaron took the time to explain every product they had and what it can help with. I had no idea there were other cananbanoids other than CBD. He also made sure I knew how much to take so I would not waste or undertake. If you are going to try CBD, you need to go here.

resp.text: Thanks, Steve. We are always eager to teach those who want to learn.

name: Laura Leigh
text: We are so pleased with the products and services at Simply CBD. Our sweet Pup suffers from epilepsy and they have been so helpful in helping us find the product for him. If you have questions about CBD and it's benefits please go see them. You will not be disappointed.

name: Dana Walker
text: I was referred by my Dr at Thomas Hospital to try CBD and he said these guys know the most in the area.I have severe fibromyalgia. I can't say he was wrong. Aaron spent about 30 min with me going over everything. I walked out with the pain cream. It works in about 10 min for me. Very happy I stopped in. I recommend.

resp.text: Thanks, Dana. I'm glad you had a good experience.

name: Lizzie Hughes
text: Very knowledgeable and helpful.have learned a lot.

name: Dr. Larson
text: Being in the medical field I have been somewhat reluctant to recommend CBD. After attending one the Simply CBD's educations seminars at a local hospital I was able to spend about an hour with the owners. I can tell you that I came away feeling confident with Simply CBD and their products, but most importantly their knowledge. If you plan on trying or using,give them a try

name: Saara Simard
text: Amazing customer service. I I quired about the pet cbd oil for my boxer mix who has seizures and got a phone call back from a real human! They were super helpful and the product has already made a huge difference for her seizures. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks, Saara. We are so happy its working well.

name: Terry Jenkins
text: Incredible customer service. Aaron and staff are very knowledgeable about their product and are very helpful in selecting the right CBD product for your needs. They have changed my life! I highly recommend Simply CBD!

resp.text: Thanks, Terry. Glad it's working so well. Thanks for the kind words

name: Kat Keeney
text: So helpful, great products and they really take the time to help you find the best products for your needs!! Will definitely be back!

name: Seth Port
text: Great little shop in Daphne! I’ve stopped in a couple times now and the staff is always incredibly friendly and knowledgeable about their products. They make it a very pleasant experience and take their customer service seriously. I wouldn’t give any weight to the one star reviews I see here. Not saying that bad days are impossible to have, but there is no way they are talking about the same guys I met at the store. I have a good feeling there is another shop owner in town who is apparently a petty enough person to leave fake reviews. That being said, 5 star review from me and I will gladly recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Thanks, Seth. Those kind words mean a lot

name: Judson Smith
text: I spent about 40 minutes with Aaron the other day learning much more about CBD than I thought was out there.  The atmosphere in the store is elegant and inviting.  This was my first visit to a CBD store.  I was really impressed and see no reason to go anywhere else in town.  Really looking forward to doing business in the future.  Thanks again Aaron!  Chad, I look forward to meeting you.

resp.text: Thanks, Judson. Great to meet you too. I enjoyed our chat!

name: Amanda
text: I really like this store. It’s a very nice and welcoming place. There’s a great selection of products to try, including coffee! The coffee is a great way to start your morning... a fantastic addition to the mix. Don’t be shy, go check it out!

resp.text: Thanks, Amanda. It was great to meet you.

name: Ryan Ware
text: Great staff with a wide variety of great products!

name: Tiffany Strickland
text: Wow, such great service and their products are amazing. I walked in looking for relief from my headaches. I was offered some salve to rub on my temples. Nice, right? I was also informed about the gummies and Cbd vapes. I walked out with a smile, some goodies and a couple of freebies, just for being a first time customer. As far as my headache, it was gone within maybe 10 minutes of trying the salve! I’ve taken Tylenol all day, with no relief. Highly, recommend!

resp.text: Great to meet you, Tiffany.

name: Taylor Holley
text: Austin and I have been to this store many times the owners are both great. They are super helpful and informative and will spend time answering any questions you have and helping you find what is best for you . We will continue to go here !

name: Laura Rodgers
text: SO GLAD i STOPPED IN. i HAVE BEEN STRUGGLING WITH SLEEP FOR YEARS. AFTER STOPPING IN AARON SHOWED ME HOW PRODUCTS ARE DIFFERENT AND WHAT WOULD HELP. I'M HAPPY TO SAY I AM FINALLY SLEEPING! YES ALL IN CAPS BECAUSE THEY ARE GREAT

name: Linda Olepa
text: Stopped by 30 min before they were open. Aaron greeted my and let me in. He walked me around the store and explained everything. Great selection of everything. I have been to other CBD stores that call themselves ' Super Stores " that have far less than this place. This is a go to for me moving forward.

resp.text: So nice to meet you Linda

name: Bob Stelt
text: Best selection, I visit both stores depending on which side of the bay im on

resp.text: Thank you for the support. We appreciate you as a customer

name: Marco Gonzalez
text:
I find it very weird almost all of the reviews for Simply CBD are brand new accounts with no other reviews, seems very fishy to me. Against my best judgement I went into the store and they seemed more interested in selling me anything under the sun than listening to my actual ailments.

EDIT TO RESPOND: It is convenient you glossed over the fact that most all of your reviews are by 1 star reviewers with no other reviews.

resp.text:
Thanks for the feedback, Marco. I think you may have gone to a different store and sadly not Simply CBD. We don't have outsourced products nor pseudo marijuana, however, if you do make your way to Simply CBD , we'd love to meet you. We encourage our clients that have a great experience to leave reviews so others may experience the success that so many have had.

Update: Google has confirmed this review was made by the IP address belonging to John Mcaruther of Fairhope Hemp. This is the 5th attempt that Fairhope Hemp has made to leave negative reviews. Google has removed the others. I asked that this one stays so others may read. We wish you the best, John

name: jacob glisson
text: Aaron is amazing! Very friendly, social, and welcoming! Took his time to explain and chat with us about all our questions! Will definitely be coming back for all our CBD needs!

name: marsha sutton
text: So this place is great and here's why. I was unsure of CBD and have been in the store three times asking questions. Each time I came in they were just as friendly and didn't mind answering all the same questions. I finally tried a 1000 mg oil and in a week I have to say its working exactly like they said it would.

name: Brent Comotiz
text: I've been meaning to leave this for a week and finally here it is. This is a great store with best selection that I have seen. Owners are great. They actually directed me to a less expensive product and explained why it would work better. I've been going to other CBD stores and NO ONE has ever done that.

resp.text: Thanks, Brent. Your review is much appreciated.

name: Reggie Pulliam
text: Aaron and Chad are not only revolutionary with their service, but with their genuine care for the health of the community. Simply CBD will do wonders for anybody who chooses to use their products and follow their guidance. Great store. Great people.

resp.text: Thanks, Reggie. Kind words from you mean a lot.

name: Erica Framboise
text: Just moved from Colorado Springs. So happy to find a real store selling legit real products. So much garbage out there and this stuff works great. I actually used to live my the fields near Manitou Springs Colorado. Great job guys!

name: carey Puricelli
text: Super knowledgeable, very friendly, and had many products!

name: Leslie VanHauter
text: When I first stepped into Simply CBD, I was unsure of the products and what I might need.  Aaron and Chad listened to understand my ailments.  They explained the benefits of each product and helped me understand what could help my condition.  They've created a welcoming environment and I will be back to try more products.

resp.text: Thanks, so much!

name: Zann
text: From the second I walked in Aron welcomed me in and made me feel well taken care of the entire time. He educated me on what CBD is and listened to some of my concerns and offered me certain things that I would be interested in. Overall Great service, Good vibes, and even let me sample some of the amazing CBD water!

resp.text: Thanks, Zann. Great to meet you.

name: russ copeland
text: The store is awesome and they have a great selection of products. Staff answered all of my questions and I am excited to try the CBD oils. Will definitely be back!

resp.text: Thanks, Russ

name: Jack Rich
text: This is the most professional and knowledgeable place I’ve ever been too. Those guys know the science behind every aspect of CBD. First place I have purchased from where I felt  confident about the purchase I made. Quit wasting time at vape shops. Will be a long time customer. They represent the CBD industry the way it should be. Kudos!

resp.text: Thanks, Jack. Great to meet you.

name: Daron Harris
text: Having this store open in the area (and in Alabama) is such a blessing. My wife has been battling Stage IV breast cancer and all of the related side-effects and pain in her body for several years now. Being able to access these type of products more affordably and conveniently is a big help to us.  What really stands out about the store is of course the amazing selection of products, but above and beyond that, the knowledge base of the staff, particularly Aaron. Aaron combined his command of the products with his skills in listening to what our needs were to connect us to the right set of choices for us.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Darron

name: Charlotte Plunkett
text: This place is a godsend.  From the depth and beauty of the store to the depth and breadth of the selection.  Owners so knowledgable and helpful i feel relaxed before i leave the door.  Products are easy to use, priced to sell and best of all they WORK!  thank you thank you thank you!

resp.text: Wow. Thanks for the kind words.

name: James Barker
text: Friendly and informative staff. Very clean and warm environment. Great product selection and advice!

resp.text: Happy to meet you , James

name: Rat Tail Toneworks
text: Really nice people and awesome service.

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words and confidence you have in us!!

name: alysa mckee
text: This place is absolutely amazing. I finally found a place that wants to educate you. The prices are absolutely amazing. The stuff actually works. Thank you, so much for your time.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words

name: Claudia Washington
text: The owner was SOOO kind and professional I came from mobile and he was very informative! Definitely worth the drive!

resp.text: Wow! Thanks

name: Kristin McDaniels
text: Such an awesome place.  Owner was really nice.   Stopped and talked to use for awhile .   After using the products i feel more relaxed and can focus better

resp.text: Appreciate your kind words, Kristin

name: Joann Cammarata
text: I was visiting from out of town and drove past Simply CBD. I stopped in not knowing anything about their products and left knowing more than my local store has ever shared. Great people!

resp.text: It was a pleasure meeting you, Joann

name: Chris Bean
text: This store is fabulous!!  The owners are very friendly and knowledgeable. I also love the locally made bath products.

resp.text: Really appreciate the feedback!

name: Brittany Sheppard
text: A friend of mine showed me this place. I have been ordering all my CBD items online. It was so nice to have a face to face talk about what I have been using and what I may want to try. Answered all my questions and left knowing a little more.

resp.text: Thanks, Brittany so nice to meet you.

name: Dana Mitchell
text: My husband was just released from Hosp. from having a portion of his lung removed, so needless to say I have had some anxiety. This store is sent from heaven. Aaron is patient and informative. Thanks you , Simply CBD

name: Hillary Burger
text: I can’t recommend this place more! The customized buying experience is unparalleled. I will never buy online again! Chad will 100% take care of you!

resp.text: Thanks so much, Hillary

name: Ashley Hollinger
text: Before I came in I emailed asking a question and got a response in less than 5 minutes, which with most places doesn't happen. I went in later that afternoon to see if there was a product I wanted to buy. I am extremely new to the cbd scene and know almost zero information about any of it. Aaron was able to answer any questions I had, and even answered questions I would not have thought to ask. He was extremely knowledgeable and personable which made shopping there an easy and awesome experience. I wound up buying a pen and a loaded cartridge for it. I am very much looking forward to going back there and purchasing other products.

resp.text: Thanks, Ashley. So great to meet you both.

name: Adri Senpai
text: Very welcoming! Super inclusive, informative, and friendly! Come see Aaron and Chad. I promise you that you won't regret it.(:

resp.text:
Adri,
Was so nice to meet and chat with you. Hope everything worked out for you!

name: Ella Vision
text: Simply CBD is awesome! Staff was intelligent and well informed about their products. I will definitely be going back for more product.

resp.text: So glad it was a great experience, Chris

name: Richard Henderson
text: Great first experience in this store. The staff was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. Great product selection (edibles, vapes, lotions, beard oils, dog treats, ect.) I would recommend this store to anyone that uses CBD or is curious about trying it. I'll definitely be going back.

resp.text: Thanks, Richard. Great to meet you

name: Jory Martinez
text: Chad was extremely helpful on spreading knowledge and awareness of their CBD products! Down to earth people. I would recommend their business to anyone!

resp.text: Thanks, Jory. Great to meet you.

name: karolina higgins
text: By far my favorite CBD store!!! Aaron is super friendly and helpful. Will absolutely be going again!!

name: John McKinney
text: I've been in a few times. Always good information. Hands down the best CBD products on the eastern shore at Simply CBD.

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Mark Davis
text: I love this store! Their product range is awesome! And they are more than happy to help with dosing and recommendations

resp.text: Thanks, Mark. We appreciate the kind words

name: Jenny Redmon
text: This place is absolutely amazing. I was in a car accident and dealt with back and neck pain for the last 2 months. Within the first 10 minutes of being here, Aaron gave me something and the pain was completely gone! I will definitely be back!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words, Jenny!!

name: ur friendly neighbourhood garbage man
text: Couldn't help but stay and learn about the kinds of CBS and what's best for different kinds of people! So nice and helpful!!

resp.text: great to meet you!

text: Simply CBD is amazing. Very knowledgeable staff. They offer more than CBD oils and you can find  something for everyone.

name: megan Meshelle
text: The owner is very friendly and approachable very welcoming atmosphere went in my back was hurting as i go to therapy 3 days a week he gave me the hard candy within 5 minutes my back pain was so much better he was absolutely rite about all the information he gave me thank you simply cbd

name: Richard Evens
text: I have been driving out to Canabama for the last few months to get CBD for my arthritis. This location is way more convenient and I feel like they know a little more about the products. I'm going to start going here from now on.

name: Matt B

resp.text: Thanks, Matt. Great to meet you both. Let us know how things work for you.

name: PsychoSchemer
text: Fantastic customer experience! Chad knows their products well and is ready to answer any questions. Happy!

resp.text: Thanks so much!

name: R P
text: Friendly and knowledgeable, super informative on all of their products.

name: Devin Choinski
text: every time my wife and I go to this cbd shop we are always greeted with a smile and a positive attitude. All of the employees are extremely helpful and have very high quality items. I would recommend this shop to everyone who might be interested in trying cbd or if you are looking for high quality cbd this is the one stop shop. The employees also go out of their way to educate you on the products that are currently in the store and go into depth on what products will benefit you the most. I have nothing but the at most respect for all of the employees at (simply CBD) do yourselves a favor and stop by the shop. You will not regret it!!

resp.text: WOW! Really appreciate that, Devin

name: Stephen Jackson
text: The Costa Rican CBD infused coffee is amazing! Simply CBD is a great addition to the area. Can’t wait to try the other products!

resp.text: Thanks for trying and thanks for the review

name: Beth Oltean
text: Great store with people who know what they are talking about. Happy I stopped in

name: Todd Blackwell
text: Hands down the best. I had been going elsewhere because of trouble sleeping. No one ever explained CBD vs CBG. Starting CBG has been the best thing ever. I can fall asleep and best of all stay asleep.

name: Meghan Williams
text: Aaron was great! So knowledgeable and helpful.  A wide variety of products to choose from

resp.text: Wow! Thanks for the kind words!

name: Nathan Sides TSTREETZ200010
text: They got everything you need.. the 2 guys that work there are very friendly and helped me with the many questions I had.. I would totally recommend this place and will keep going back myself We need more people like this in the world!!

resp.text: Wow! Thanks for the kind words. We are happy to help.

name: Hammet Blackwell
text: Drive down from Fairhope. Staff was very knowledgeable and the store was nice. I’ve been taking a lower quality CBD for 3 months and noticed the difference in their product in 2 weeks. It’s helped me sleep and my back pain.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words.

name: Donna Dubose
text: I was looking for a CBD store near me, I googled and saw they were the top rated, so I stopped in. I can see why. These guys take what they are doing seriously. I'll be back !
